newsitem.title: USA: Marsh & McLennan to split stock, raise div.
newsitem.headline: Marsh & McLennan to split stock, raise div.

text.p: Marsh & McLennan Cos Inc said Wednesday its management will recommend a two-for-one stock split and an 11 percent dividend increase at the company's board meeting later today.
The dividend increase would bring the company's quarterly cash dividend to $1.00 per share from $0.90, excluding the effect of any stock split.
Marsh & McLennan is an insurance, investment management and consulting services company.
